item.description: The Baby Grand Jazz Series has been ongoing since January and will be ending soon, so let's take advantage of what the City has to offer.  Sinan Bakir will be playing his guitar along with his band. Please arrive by 2:30pm as seating goes quickly.  If you will be delayed please call Judi at 203-915-6766 or Stuart at 860-561-4060.  Depending on the group and how soon you sign up, we can discuss going out after for a bite.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet up by the elevators, so we will look for you, so please let us know if you have a last minute change.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: The Best Things in Life are Free
